overview: Don't let these sweet, innocent faces fool you. The girls of Barely Legal 25 are bad right down to the bone-or they want to be, anyway. One precious angel can barely fit her tiny hands around the giant cock she stuffs in her mouth. Isn't she dirty? Another little darling crams the biggest, hardest dick she can find into her teeny asshole. There's nothing nastier, is there?
title: Barely Legal 25
